text: hi I'm Curtis Hartman a principal
product manager with AWS today's video
is going to focus on getting started
with Amazon chime voice connector a new
offering that enables companies to
significantly reduce telephone calling
cost for their on-premise phone systems
such as private branch exchange Azure PD
X's but voice connector companies can
make low-cost calls to the public switch
telephone network and dial into chime
meetings at no cost from their desk
phones voice connector uses industry
standard session initiation protocol
with full support for income and calling
to direct inward dial phone numbers and
outbound calling to more than a hundred
countries so let's get started from the
AWS management console select Amazon
chime and as a first step we were going
to acquire direct inward dial telephone
numbers for your company do that simply
navigate to the phone number management
page under the calling section in the
left-hand pane and select the provision
phone numbers button within the orders
tab select a voice connect a radio
button and then next you can now search
for phone numbers based on country state
and city or area code choose your
desired phone numbers and select the
provision button within a few seconds
your phone numbers will be available in
the inventory tab once you have acquired
phone numbers navigate to the voice
connector tab and select the create new
connection button provide a name and
then choose whether to enable encryption
next you'll configure the session
initiation protocol parameters and
assign phone numbers to make your voice
connector operational for termination
that's calls from your PBX to AWS these
parameters are managed in the
termination tab for each voice connector
AWS provides a unique outbound host name
the form of a fully qualified domain
name or fqdn this fqdn should be
provisioned in your enterprise PBX as
the destination to send out bounced of
calls we provide two security mechanisms
to ensure that only your PBX can access
your voice connect including IP
whitelisting and sip authentication you
can also define which countries your PBX
users are allowed to dial and a default
caller ID for outgoing calls for
origination that's calls from AWS to
your PBX these parameters are managed in
the origination tab where you configure
IP addresses or fut ends of your
enterprise PBX these parameters govern
how AWS routes calls to your enterprise
voice connector supports up to ten
routes for load sharing and failover
finally you assign phone numbers to the
voice connector and the phone numbers
tab and that's a quick overview of how
to configure Amazon chime voice
connector thank you for joining us and
for more information you can visit our
website
[Music]
